they persuaded their friend kill (camel) he obliged
Consequently quam terrible est My retribution! They warned
Nos sent them 1 blow whereupon they became like harvested hay
Nos factus Quran easy learn any de vos wish learn
people Lot rejected warnings
Nos showered them rocks Unus Lot's familia saved apud dawn
Nos beatus eum his familia; nos sic reward appreciative
He warned them noster requital they ridiculed warnings
They negotiated eum his guests; nos blinded them. Suffer My retribution; vos warned
Nudius the deinde morning devastating retribution struck them
Suffer My retribution; vos warned
Nos factus Quran easy learn any de vos wish learn
Pharaoh's people warned
They rejected totus noster signum. Consequently nos requited them prout Almighty Omnipotent should
est tuus disbelievers bene than those disbelievers? Vos absolved scripture
Perhaps they think Nos est winners
Totus de them defeated they turn circiter flee
Hora awaiting them Hora est far malus painful
Certainly guilty est astray finis in Hell
They dragged hellfire forcibly. Suffer agony retribution
Everything nos created precisely measured
